data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book chapter Whittacker, Andrew, Aleixo, Alexandre, Smith, Brian T., Klicka, J. (2013): A distinctive new species of gnatcatcher in the Polioptila guianensis complex (Aves, Polioptilidae) from western Amazonian Brazil. In: Handbook of the Birds of the Wold Special volume: new species and global index. Barcelona: Lynx Edicions: 301-305, ISBN: 978-84-96553-88-0, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.15074|3 occurrences
